document.full_text: violence erupted on israel's borders with syria, lebanon and gaza on sunday, leaving at least eight dead and dozens wounded, as palestinians marked what they term "the catastrophe" of israel's founding in 1948.
document.title: israel-palestinian violence erupts on three borders
lines_and_colors: violence erupted on israel's borders with syria, lebanon and gaza on sunday, leaving at least eight dead and dozens wounded, as palestinians marked what they term "the catastrophe" of israel's founding in 1948.
